sources.title: Shadow Builder (1998) Horror, Thriller | Directed by Jamie Dixon | Be afraid of the dark!
sources.description:
A demon is summoned to take the soul of a young boy, who has the potential to become a saint. By doing this, he will open a doorway to Hell, and destroy the world.

Original title: Shadow Builder (1998) AKA: Bram Stoker's Shadowbuilder

This film is available with English, French, Portuguese & Russian audio.  And subtitled in many language options.  Go to settings ⚙️ to select your options.

Director: Jamie Dixon
Writers: Michael Stokes, Bram Stoker
Stars: Michael Rooker, Leslie Hope, Shawn Thompson, Andrew Jackson
Genres: Action, Horror, Thriller, Literary

metadata.Plot: An evil Archbishop of the Catholic Church summons a demon to try and destroy the world. The summoners are killed, but the demon escapes to hunt down its needed victim. The victim soon turns out to be a child that has the potential to become a saint. After ravaging the town and turning its citizens upon themselves, the demon soon locates and captures his prey.
metadata.Actors: Michael Rooker, Leslie Hope, Shawn Thompson
